title: General workflow
text: This page summarises the general, biome-adapted workflow used to assess ecosystem condition.

title: Overview
text: This section explains what we mean by ecosystem condition, why it matters, and how we interpret condition across South Africa’s biomes.

title: Ecosystem Condition Assessments — South Africa
text:
Welcome. This website documents a biome-specific approach to assessing ecosystem condition in South Africa.
Use the menu to explore: - Overview (definitions, scope) - Workflow (general method) - Thicket and Grassland (biome sections)

Note: This is a living resource and will be updated as additional biomes and indicators are added.

title: Grassland
